Description:

Epic adventure in the smallest details. With Bilbo Baggins, Gandalf, 
Thorin Oakenshield and detachment Dwarfs go to the epic journey across 
the expanses of Middle-earth. Return the Lonely Mountain to its rightful 
owners, in the most multi-faceted LEGO-game!

Features:
Fight with carnivorous trolls, evil orcs and other creatures of darkness.
Combining unique abilities gnomes find spectacular (and often hilarious) 
solving puzzles.
Explore legendary corners of Middle-earth - from the Shire through the 
city goblins and further east.
